name: TowerCreeps
description:
TowerCreeps is a small tower defense game with the goal of defending your own base while extending your line of towers to destroy the enemy base.

I created TowerCreeps for the Devtober game jam of 2019 as my first substantial game development project. Please be aware that in it's current state it is still lacking quite a few features to make it a good game or even a complete game. One should rather take it as a snapshot documenting my personal development.
